Key Match Events: Kansas City Royals' bullpen pitched 6 2/3 innings of two-hit ball after Michael Lorenzen's early exit.
Michael Massey singled in a run off DJ Herz to help lift the Royals to a second straight shutout victory.
Pre-Game Insights: Royals manager Matt Quatraro emphasized the importance of challenging hitters.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Matt Quatraro highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push.
DJ Herz (4-9) allowed a run on a Michael Massey single.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals held on to the second American League wild card with a 3-0 win.
The Royals' bullpen extended their scoreless streak to 15 2/3 innings over four games.
Others: Michael Lorenzen was optioned to Triple-A Omaha to make room for Steven Cruz.
Patrick Corbin was set to pitch his final game for the Washington Nationals.
